attributes.action: intervine in the media in order to reduce Rupert Murdoch's influence over the people of Britain, and introduce a fair, non biased media.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, the following newspapers are owned by Newscorp, a large multinational company owned by Rupert Murdoch:

The Sun, 
News of the World, 
The Times, 
Sunday Times.

These newspapers are read by the majority of the English people and so Rupert Murdoch's right-wing influence can effectively control the public mood.

This petition calls for a fair, non biased media to be introduced in to society so that people can evalute the national (and international) situation independently.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
